title: DemonBlade yasuo & nerfs?
body:
I heard yasuo is about to get a nerf? 
yet in the next patch he is getting a skin , i will be kinda suprised if he gets a nerf to be honest the same time he is getting a skin

replies.body: It happens all the time? they nerfed a champion on the same patch they got a legendary skin (cant remember who though)
i don't think this ever happen before .. what's the  point of giving someone a legendary skin and nerf him? whos gonna buy the skin ...
So you're saying that people only buy skins because a champion is strong or OP? Dang, I've been doing it wrong the whole time and buying skins because I LIKE the champion or skin.
Yeah, i just cant remember who it was
Many people don't like to lane against Yasuo because he is a special champ
There is only one thing worse than having Yasuo in the enemy team and that's having Yasuo in your team.
